short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension detects fake or unwanted sites based on similarty of user entries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Penguin Link checks domain similarities from allowed list defined by user, alerts if there is high similarity. Penguin Link tries to protect user from fake sites. Penguin Link does not guarantees  any level of security. It is experimental extension, please use it at your own risk.
